title: section 31(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (State Authority) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (state authority) order 2024

title: section 31(1) of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act
heading: 2. The Strategic Banking Corporation of Ireland is prescribed for the
text_raw:
2. The Strategic Banking Corporation of Ireland is prescribed for the 
purposes of paragraph (j) of the definition of “State authority” in section 31(1) 
of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 
of 2014). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 May, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [193] 3
